data.title: Yeovil Literary Festival 2023 Event Deborah Meaden: Why Money Matters
data.text:
Dragon's Den investor and entrepeneur Deborah Meaden wants to get everyone talking about Why Money Matters. Deborah believes we should be educating children about money from an early age, at school and at home too! So much so she has written a new book in a ground-breaking new series for children aged 6-9.

Deborah will be sharing her wisdom on subjects including where money comes from, how it shapes the world we live in today and how we can empower and inspire all children to become money experts. The perfect event for parents, teachers, children and anyone else wanting to know more about Why Money Matters.

Tickets: £12

Children: £7.50

Footlights: Discount applies

A £1.50 ticket levy is included in all stated ticket prices.

Yeovil Literary Festival Events last approximately 60 minutes.
